name: Steel Judgement
description:
I Present to you Steel Judgement, a game demo I've created for my University Module, Games Practical Project. The main aim of this project was to work on my level design skills and also to create and develop quests. The Demo lasts about 20 minutes.

Worked on this for around 9 weeks.

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

LMB - Mouse Click

I - Inventory
